title: Gold Rises Toward $5,000 as Weaker Dollar Adds Impetus to Rally
description: Gold rose to a record high near $5,000 an ounce, as geopolitical risk and threats to the Federal Reserve’s independence added support to a rally fueled by a retreat from currencies and bonds.
content: Gold rose to a record high near $5,000 an ounce, as geopolitical risk and threats to the Federal Reserve’s independence added support to a rally fueled by a retreat from currencies and bonds.
